debug_text.text: 'MOD: KUDA DAT -- Number of missing variables set: %s.'.[$MissingVarCount]

signal_cue_instantly.param: table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ForceTravel then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ForceTravel then $TextGreen else $TextRed, $halign = 'center', ], $onClick = Execute_DynamicEnable, $onRightClick = Execute_DynamicEnable, $echo = ['$MoveGeneric','$ForceTravel',global.$DATweaks.$MoveGeneric.$ForceTravel] ]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: KUDA DAT -- Updated global.$DATweaks.%s.%s from %s to %s'.[event.param.$echo.{1},event.param.$echo.{2},event.param.$echo.{3},global.$DATweaks.{event.param.$echo.{1}}.{event.param.$echo.{2}}]
'MOD: KUDA DAT -- ERROR -- could not find global.$DATweaks.%s.%s'.[event.param.$echo.{1},event.param.$echo.{2}]
'MOD: KUDA DAT -- Updated global.$DATweaks.%s.%s from %s to %s'.[event.param.$echo.{1},event.param.$echo.{2},event.param.$echo.{3},global.$DATweaks.{event.param.$echo.{1}}.{event.param.$echo.{2}}]
'MOD: KUDA DAT -- ERROR -- could not find global.$DATweaks.%s.%s'.[event.param.$echo.{1},event.param.$echo.{2}]
'MOD: KUDA DAT -- ERROR -- unexpected datatype in global.$DATweaks.%s.%s -- Data: %s'.[$Key,$EmbeddedKey,@global.$DATweaks.{$Key}.{$EmbeddedKey}]
'MOD: KUDA DAT -- ERROR -- unexpected datatype in global.$DATweaks.%s -- Data: %s'.[$Key,@global.$DATweaks.{$Key}]
